text: Jadranka Đokić (born 14 January 1981) is a Croatian actress. For her roles in theatre, television and film,'Sestra Helga' kao underground ikonaGLUMICA KOJU JE PROSLAVILA ULOGA SESTRE HELGE U NAŠOJ MALOJ KLINICI 'Ponosna sam, odana i iskrena. Kad ne glumim, vrijeme za sebe nalazim u šumi' (in Croatian) she is considered one of the greatest Croatian actresses of her generation.Jadranka Đokić odlično spaja nespojivo (Kultura - in Croatian)Vecernji.hr Jadranka Đokić: Ivan ima sve ono što nemaju drugi muškarci, on ima mene == Filmography == === Film roles === Year Title Role Notes 1999 Šverceri hlapić Nataša Mrlek Supporting role 2002 Fine Dead Girls Lidija Main role 2004 Sorry for Kung Fu Zorica Supporting role 2007 Pusti me da spavam Klara Main role 2008 Behind the Glass Maja Jeren Main role Golden Arena for Best Actress 2009 Storm Belma Šulić Main role 2009 Metastases Krpa's wife 2010 Izgubljeni snovi Julija 2012 Drugi Vinka 2012 Night Boats Hairdresser Supporting role 2012 Zagrebačke priče vol. 2 Jelena Main role 2012 Inspector Martin and the Gang of Snails Ivna Voice Supporting role 2013 The Priest's Children Ana Main role 2016 Transmania Manja 2019 Sam samcat Dubravka === Television roles === Year Title Role Notes 2005 Kad zvoni?
